unnormalised: kalchea Pro Kabaddi Leagueachea matchent Bengaluru Bulls hannim Patna Pirates hankam 45-38 hea antim gunnan jikhlem. Bullsacho Pawan Kumar Sehrawat hannem 15 raid points melloyle, zalear Piratesachea Sachin Tanwar hannem 12 points melloyle. Kanteerava Indoor Stadiumant zalelya hea matchent sumar 83 points zoddle.
normalised: kalchea Pro Kabaddi League matchant, Bengaluru Bulls hannem Patna Pirates haka ponchallisank ttees aattachea final scorean haroile. Bullsacho Pawan Kumar Sehrawat hannem pondra raid points jikhle, zalear Piratesacho Sachin Tanwar hannem bara jikhle. Kanteerava Indoor Stadiumant zal'lea matchant ekunn ekeassi points jikhle.

unnormalised: Bharotiya cricket team-an Australia desacho doro 2-1 series jikhun sampoilo. Gabba, Brisbane hangasorchea nimanneachea test matchent Bharotan panchvea disak 328 runanchi pratiha keli. Rishabh Pant hannem aprajit 89 runs kele, ani taka Man of the Match inam favo zalem. Hi series jikhop Bharotan Australia desant jikhleli dusri lagoli test series zali.
normalised: Bharoti cricket team-an Australia-cho tour donank ek series jikhun sompoilo. Gabba, Brisbane hangasorchea final test matchant, Bharotan panchvea disak teenxim battees run-anchem target puro kelem. Rishabh Pant hannem not out unneassi run kelo, ani taka Man of the Match purskar favo zalo. Australian bhumichear hi Bharotachi dusri lagata test series jikhop aslem.

unnormalised: Badmintonant, PV Sindhu All England Openachea semi-finalsant pavli, punn Akane Yamaguchi kodden harly. Tai Tzu Ying hache virudh Sindhuchea quarterfinal matchent 21-17, 13-21, 21-19 oso score aslo. Tournamentachea inamachi rokdichi zomo $1.1 million USD asli.
normalised: Badmintonant, P-V Sindhu All England Open-achea semi-finalsant pavli, punn Akane Yamaguchi-kodden harl. Tai Tzu Ying hache virud'd Sindhu-cho quarterfinal match ekeesank satra, teraank ekees, ekeesank unnees hankani somplo. Tournamentachem prize money pool ek point ek million U-S-D aslem.

unnormalised: Bharotiya purush hockey team-an Asian Gamesant bhangarachem podok jikhlem, finalant Pakistanak 3-2 haroun. Harmanpreet Singh hannem Bharota khatir 2 goals kele, ani antim goal nimanneachea minttant ailo. Hi jikh Bharotachea yetea Olympic Gamesak patratai nirdharit karta.
normalised: Bharoti dadleanchea hockey team-an Asian Gamesant Pakistan haka teenank don-an haroun bhangarachem podok jikhlem. Harmanpreet Singh hannem Bharota khatir don goal kele, ani jikhpacho goal final minuteak ailo. Hea zaitak lagun Bharotachea yetolea Olympic Games-ak patratai mell'lli.

unnormalised: FIFA World Cupachea finalant Argentina hannem France hankam 3-3 draw zalea uprant penaltiesant 4-2 haroile. Lionel Messi hannem matchent 2 goals kele ani taka Golden Ball inam dilem. Kylian Mbappé hannem France khatir hat-trick keli, ani 8 goals korun Golden Boot melloylem. Sumar 1.5 billion lokanim hi match polleli oso andaz asa.
normalised: F-I-F-A World Cup final-ant Argentina-n France haka tinank tin draw zalea uprant fourank two penalties-in haroile. Lionel Messi hannem matchant don goal kele ani taka Golden Ball purskar favo zalo. Kylian Mbappé hannem France khatir hat-trick kelo, aatt goalank lagun taka Golden Boot mell'llo. Ho match sumar ek point panch billion lokamni polloilo.
